job title: Data Modeler With Extensive Bi/Dw Exp
job description:
Should have approximately 10 years as Data modeler with total exp should not exceed 15 years.

Takes in business requirements, scopes out exact information from the SORs

Has excellent analysis skills scoping for data

Creates designs, visual aids, data mappings

Has excellent stakeholder management skills

Has the responsibility to see the project thru from start to finish

Has worked as data architect extensively in a data warehouse environment

Has excellent skills in Oracle/EXADATA is a plus ( Teradata is also ok )

Has exposure to Banking and experience in Treasury/Wholesale Banking is a plus

Has experience dealing with cross teams, cross domains

Has excellent written and oral communication skills

Has capacity to size projects, efforts, time and resources
